name: Vinfotech
tagline: Fantasy Sports Web & App Development Company
description:
Vinfotech creates world's best social networks, fantasy sports and healthcare solutions. We promise initial set of real engaged users to put turbo in your platform. Our award winning software vSocial™ and vFantasy™ allows us to build stellar web applications better. Our customers include Aston Martin, Burberry, Arabian Gulf League and Snapdeal.
We’re a new breed of product development company, born from the world of design thinking and focused on tremendous level of user engagement. We know what it takes to build successful digital experiences in an increasingly noisy world, providing solutions that are sticky and that the users keep coming back to.
We help companies re imagine the way they connect with millennial customers and engage them meaningfully on the healthcare, fantasy platform and social network. Started as a regular fantasy sports betting product, we are identifying better use-cases of engaging people on the rewards platforms and making amazing things happen like increasing revenues, creating exceptional social experiences and a huge boost in brand recognition.
READ MORE...
